triggers.name: EXT_NON_AMS_awareness_Campaign_Nov20
triggers.description: EMAIL is not null  AND ACCOUNT_STATUS_CODE_DESC equal Active AND WORKPLACE_CLASS_CODE_DESC equal Acute Trust AND ( Product_Name equal ZERBAXA OR SPECIALTY_1_CODE_DESC equal Respiratory Medicine OR SPE

configurationArguments.criteria: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="AND" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="CRM_Profiles.EMAIL" Operator="IsNotNull" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"596663f3-84d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"}"><Value><![CDATA[]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="CRM_Profiles.ACCOUNT_STATUS_CODE_DESC" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"596663f3-84d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"}"><Value><![CDATA[Active]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="CRM_Profiles.WORKPLACE_CLASS_CODE_DESC" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"596663f3-84d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"}"><Value><![CDATA[Acute Trust]]></Value></Condition><ConditionSet Operator="OR" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="GB_Product_Metrics.Product_Name" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"596663f3-84d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"}"><AttributePath RelationshipID="8329e250-92d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"><Value><![CDATA[ZERBAXA]]></Value></AttributePath></Condition><Condition Key="CRM_Profiles.SPECIALTY_1_CODE_DESC" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"596663f3-84d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"}"><Value><![CDATA[Respiratory Medicine]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="CRM_Profiles.SPECIALTY_1_CODE_DESC" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"596663f3-84d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"}"><Value><![CDATA[Microbiology]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="CRM_Profiles.SPECIALTY_1_CODE_DESC" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"596663f3-84d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"}"><Value><![CDATA[Intensive Care]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="CRM_Profiles.SPECIALTY_1_CODE_DESC" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"596663f3-84d0-e811-a2c3-1402ec938a89"}"><Value><![CDATA[Infectious Diseases]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="CRM_Profiles.SPECIALTY_1_CODE_DESC" Operator="Equal"
